channel.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
channel.description:
Hi what happened here?
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/64496889/spon2.png[/img]
There is servers that wasn't even on the biddings?

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:14, topic:547196”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=666100.msg4453141#msg4453141 date=1412957732]
Do server benefit from advertising here? It barley tooks active.
[/quote]
mopar’s toplist is more active than rune-server’s but less active than google’s so yeah it’s worthwhile paying for a spot here[/quote]
does not look like it.

Read full topic

mopar’s toplist is more active than rune-server’s but less active than rune-locus’s so yeah it’s worthwhile paying for a spot here

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Muhamed1, post:12, topic:547196”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=666100.msg4453149#msg4453149 date=1412961305]
So instead of PMing one of the staff members or going on IRC you create a topic…

From the status topic it says bidding is from the 1st to the 10th, which I would understand means the new list would be updated the 11th.
[/quote]

I PMED staff when they were online with no result.
And I’ve bought the sponsor before and always updated 10th, it did for some people but apparently, it never removed last months servers of it. ( which is why it shows 15 servers, normal is 10. ).[/quote]No point pming me I can’t do anything about it. I’ve forwarded the message to mitb for you.

Read full topic

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @Muhamed1 Muhamed1
item.description:
@Muhamed1 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:11, topic:547196”]So instead of PMing one of the staff members or going on IRC you create a topic…

From the status topic it says bidding is from the 1st to the 10th, which I would understand means the new list would be updated the 11th.[/quote]

I PMED staff when they were online with no result.
And I’ve bought the sponsor before and always updated 10th, it did for some people but apparently, it never removed last months servers of it. ( which is why it shows 15 servers, normal is 10. ).

Read full topic

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

So instead of PMing one of the staff members or going on IRC you create a topic…

From the status topic it says bidding is from the 1st to the 10th, which I would understand means the new list would be updated the 11th.

Read full topic

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @Muhamed1 Muhamed1
item.description:
@Muhamed1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:547196”]We actually aren’t allowed to talk about this crap, sadly…
Or that I know of. Last time I showed a pic of the sponsor bid page it was taken down.[/quote]

Okay, theres a bug where last months servers still appear on the page instead of the new ones that has been paid today.
Therefore we’re basically losing money/time for not being on the moparsponsor spot.

It was suppose to be like ‘bug report’ but meh.

Read full topic

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Do server benefit from advertising here? It barley tooks active.

Read full topic

item.title: [SPONSORSHIP] What happened here?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:7, topic:547196”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666100.msg4453136#msg4453136 date=1412954311]

$500 a month on RSPS… wow

Just putting it out there.
Cost $30 minimal for the advertising slot. So you do not have to pay that $475. However, there are other bidders. So sometimes $30 is too low, and you gotta step the game up to secure the spot.
[/quote]

He paid $475, though, didn’t he? It says it to the right of the box.[/quote]
Yeah, probably because the other competitors were paying around that too.
Right now the minimal bid to get up there is $150. WAY back when I wanted to do it, the minimal was like $250 +. And when I say to get on it, I mean to actually have a secured spot…

Read full topic
